books.name: The Silent Observer
books.author: Eleanor Thompson
books.description: A gripping mystery novel that follows Detective Sarah Adams as she unravels a complex case of a series of unexplained disappearances in a small, quiet town. As the secrets of the town's residents are uncovered, Sarah races against time to solve the mystery before it's too late.

books.name: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: A fantasy novel that follows the journey of Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit, as he accompanies a group of dwarves on a quest to reclaim their homeland from the dragon Smaug.

books.name: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A novel set in the Roaring Twenties, exploring themes of wealth, excess, and the American Dream through the life of Jay Gatsby and his obsession with Daisy Buchanan.

books.name: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.description: A philosophical and inspirational novel that tells the story of Santiago, a shepherd, who embarks on a journey to discover his Personal Legend and fulfill his dreams.
